summary: Today as tomorrow and as yesterday. Four women, who have been not been sterilized and are under constant toxic restraint and surveillance, are serving their term in a government-run brothel... See full summary »
cast: Vicky Harris|Jenny Kitseli|Arhontissa Mavrakaki|Eftyhia Giakoumi|Michele Valley|Alkis Panagiotidis|Angeliki Aristomenopoulou|Nefeli Efstathiadi|Christos Houliaras|Anastasia Iatrou|Dorothea Iatrou|Natasa Kapsabeli|Themis Katz|Maria Margeti|Giorgos Mihalakis|Nikos Moustakas
title: The Zero Years
